description:
Something big is taking shape under London. Discover how ArcGIS transforms Architecture, Engineering, and Construction with powerful mapping, spatial analysis, and collaboration tools - https://bit.ly/49GIsAF

Full story here - https://theb1m.com/video/londons-new-super-sewer

This video contains paid promotion for Esri. 

Research sources - 
https://www.newcivilengineer.com/latest/thames-tideway-super-sewer-cost-holds-steady-at-4-5bn-29-08-2023/
https://www.hydro-international.com/content/article/the-thames-is-liquid-history
https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2023/nov/10/thames-water-pumped-sewage-into-thames 
https://builduk.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Thames-Tideway-Tunnel-Factsheet.pdf?ssp=1&setlang=en-GB&safesearch=moderate
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-43061244

Additional footage and images courtesy of BBC, Tideway, Sky News and Channel 4.

For more by The B1M subscribe now - https://bit.ly/the-b1m

We're raising awareness of construction's mental healt
title: The Insane Engineering Behind London’s $5BN Super Sewer
